description: Door is a next generation real estate transaction platform designed to reduce the anxiety, improve the client service and reduce the transaction costs associated with home ownership. Door combines the same principals and culture across residential real estate brokerage, mortgage and title - a team-centric commitment to client service through specialization, full-time non-commissioned experts, and a belief that technology can support and improve the experience and outcomes in home ownership. Our agents and loan officers spend 100% of their time working with clients rather than lead generation. We believe the traditional 100% commission, contractor model does not align with client interests. Our success in delivering the best outcomes in real estate can be independently measured by our Zillow rating of 4.9 out of 5.0. The Door Difference: Technology as service enabler: We build technology to increase access, transparency and insights for clients in their real estate journey. Specialization : The real estate process requires a very wide range of skills, and the only way to manage each component of the process well is to specialize. Door agents & experts specialize in areas like project management, marketing, lead management, home valuation, transaction coordination and negotiation to ensure each agent is focused on what they do best. This leads to happier agents and much better outcomes for clients. Keep More of their Home Equity : Since our agents focus only on client service (instead of lead generation), they are able to close many more transactions per month than a traditional agent - and with very high client satisfaction scores. That enables Door to charge far less in fees, and for our clients to keep more of their hard-earned equity.

name: Wooden Street
description: We understand that furniture no longer attributes for “one size fits all”, so we offer an endless array of customization options to make sure the furniture is perfect for your home space! Crafting each unit with premium quality & best solid wood we ensure a lasting durability. We offer furniture for every budget! Wooden Street presents impressive range of home furnishings to reflect your style statement. Inspired by the top trends, our product range caters elegant and stylish options for furniture, home furnishings and home accessories.

name: Bureaux A Partager
description: Created in 2012 by Clement Alteresco and incubated by the company faberNovel the company BAP aims to bring together professionals seeking to share their workspaces.  Leader on the French market sharing offices, BAP wants to democratize the ''desktop sharing'' a new form of work which, beyond the financial aspect, boost the business environment.  BAP is part of the so-called collaborative economy that aims to optimize the use of existing resources through P2P technology movement.

name: ServiceBot
description: ServiceBot is a next generation software tool to manage home service businesses. Their current MVP solution is live and has the following functionality: customer management (CRM, SMS/email reminders, customer score); scheduling and dispatch (resource assignment, routing, scheduling); field Management software (GPS tracking, mobile web app); backend offices (schedules, billing, time sheets, reporting); and service pro feedback (Uber style feedback through SMS, attendance, scores). Founded in 2018, the company is headquartered in Austin, Texas, United States.

name: Arthur Online
description: Arthur Online simplifies property management, the suite of apps and web allows users to manage their portfolio’s from anywhere in the world in real time. The Arthur-Xero integration is a ‘best of breed’ approach to ensure powerful and comprehensive accounting. It allows you to produce powerful financial reports and forecasting.

name: Distrii
description: Distrii is a leading operator of co-working spaces in China, pioneering the concept of co-working in smart office to support flexible working and distributed work arrangements with state-of-the-art facilities to provide users with comprehensive office solutions. They also provide one-stop soft-packing, hard-packing construction outsourcing customization services, multiple styles of decoration between styles to meet the needs of different corporate offices.

name: OnePiece Work
description: OnePiece Work is more than just a coworking space. We are a global tech community founded on the idea that together, we can unlock new potential across industries and borders. At OnePiece Work, we believe that everyone belongs. A study discovered a 25% decrease in minority professionals’ confidence in their workplace culture, growth opportunities, and feeling of belonging at work. That’s how OnePiece Work was born. We set out to create an inclusive global community that fosters personal and professional growth. Since our founding, we’ve partnered with over 250 companies across more than 30 industries — establishing OnePiece Work as a place to create, collaborate, and thrive.

name: Divvy Parking
description: Divvy solves the parking crisis that plagues our cities by connecting drivers with unused parking spaces that would otherwise remain hidden, for less. Only Divvy creates an online marketplace for owners of commercial and residential assets who make their space available to those in need, unlocking value for everyone. Drivers book and pay for long term, secure parking on Divvy’s website [or mobile app], which takes care of bonds, payment, swipe card exchange, reporting — everything. Making parking a breeze.

name: Greyloft
description: Greyloft is a real estate agency that provides a web-based platform it offers a listing of licensed brokers online. Its platform utilizes online tools that help its clients in renting and buying decisions. Greyloft features online tools is designed to assist its clients through the course of the rental process starting from online research to paperwork and post-move-in support. The company was founded in 2014 and headquartered in Singapore.

name: STARWOOD PROPERTY TRUST
description: Starwood Property Trust (STWD) is the nation’s largest commercial mortgage REIT (market cap $4.72 billion as of 3.6.14), managed by Starwood Capital Group, with over 260 professionals worldwide. STWD is a publicly-traded investment bank investing in and originating commercial real estate debt. Specialists in customized loans for large, complex transactions, we are well-positioned to make loans from $30 million to $500 million+, with terms as short as 1 year to longer than 10 years on transitional and stabilized assets, with both fixed and floating rates.

name: Urban Intelligence
description: Urban Intelligence has developed a suite of products, driven by technology and data science, which can revolutionise property transactions by reducing transaction times and eliminating costs. At the heart of these is SiteScore, a powerful algorithm that analyses the sustainability of over 28.7 million land parcels in England and Wales by reference to the planning environment, geography, transport and educational links and over 100 other data points. SiteScore’s unique algorithm, building on years of research and input from a range of industry professionals, calculates a bespoke score for each site enabling developers and landowners to assess its potential for development. SiteScore will generate a report, similar to a credit rating, scoring the site objectively against various criteria, which will provide data on a site’s sustainability instantly and in one place, replacing multiple manual reports which are time consuming and costly to prepare. This tool will help property developers to quickly evaluate potential sites and focus attention on those with the greatest potential.

name: Pet Screening
description: Pet Screening is a simple and secure place to store all the important information about pets. It provides greater diligence for pets and assistance animals and creates comprehensive pet records for lease files. It is a third-party service utilized by housing providers and property managers to screen household pets, validate reasonable accommodation requests for assistance animals, and confirm every resident understands their pet policies. Pet Screening was founded in 2017 and is headquartered in Cornelius, North Carolina.

name: SmartHab
description: SmartHab provides an end-to-end Smart Apartment Integrated System to real estate developers. It is a complete solution encompassing interoperable hardware supply and installation (connected objects and proprietary building area network gateways) and software provision (middleware, Smart Home applications and resident contol mobile app).

name: VirtualKEY
description: Key Exchange Automated - Remotely manage access for your vacation rental without giving anyone a real key. Secure & Reliable: Don't meet guests at odd hours or worry about key duplication. No changing lock-codes either. Your property and your next guests are secure every time. Just Rent and Forget: Renting your property will never come in the way of travel, work or life. You accept the reservation and then we do the rest. Make More Money: Don't block a day between reservations and now accommodate last minute bookings. Don't lose revenue by rejecting guests with odd check-in hours.

name: WebsiteBox
description: WebsiteBox is the Toronto-based technology firm that offers do-it-all real-estate websites for a one-time $99 fee – the lowest price in the market. WebsiteBox supports IDX (Internet Data Exchange) integration with 265 multiple-listing-service boards throughout the United States and Canada. More than 10,000 real-estate professionals have chosen WebsiteBox for a full-service, custom, mobile-friendly website, complete with industry and social-media tools, customer relationship management, and web hosting.

name: Proprietário Direto
description: Proprietário Direto is a platform that directly connects real estate sellers and buyers allowing a reduction in transaction costs and time. It operates as a real estate social network. Proprietario Direto offers clients an alternative to buy and sell real estate, through a safe and innovative platform. Proprietário Direto received the 2012 Wayra Brazil and was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Housekeep
description: Housekeep is the award-winning online booking platform for professional home cleaners. Each housekeeper is interviewed-in-person, background-checked and experienced in home cleaning - so you get a 5* clean every time, backed up by a 100% satisfaction guarantee! Housekeep manage the admin for you and for your cleaner, providing online booking and payment, an initial phone call to tailor your clean and the same local housekeeper every time.

name: icomply
description: icomply enable integration with multiple unconnected CCTV and security applications into one unified front end via their CCTV software GUI (Graphical User Interface). The innovative security control room software, V-TAS Pro, combines CCTV Command and Control with integrated security software. Your control room is more efficient, intelligent and accurate with their video surveillance software.

name: Virtuality New Space
description: They use a VR headset and a gesture recognition camera to create a high quality, enjoyable experience that will allow customers to interact naturally with products using only their hands, view from every angle and customize the product in the VR.They've created an amazing shopping experience using Virtual Reality (VR), helping reatilers by reducing physical store space, and support marketing through consumer behavior analysis.

name: Acreto
description: Acreto is Security-as-a-Utility that works transparently with both new and existing technology platforms. It provides advanced Security-as-a-Service for any application ecosystem, using any equipment, on any network, operating from anywhere in the world. It is the only technology to proactively secure and mitigates threats for the entire smart device ecosystem, including devices, applications, clouds, and users. It was founded in 2017 and is headquartered in Jersey City, New Jersey.

name: dubizzle
description: A number one classified website, dubizzle.com is the easiest online platform to place free ads, allowing you to find whatever you need, sell & buy within your city. From books, baby toys, gadgets, electronics, cars and jobs, to property sale/rent and much more. Millions of users and ads in there. Give it a try and you will become addicted. It's totally free, no commissions nor agents

name: UnderTheDoormat
description: UnderTheDoormat is a premium homestay service for homeowners and guests in the high growth homestay sector. Delivering a more professional, high-quality service than P2P platforms, the company is merging two markets – homestays and hotels – to create a new one: The Branded Home Accommodation sector.  By offering a superior hospitality service in homes, UnderTheDoormat can reach homeowners and guests who would otherwise sit out the homestay revolution and by mastering the logistics of hotel-quality service across a distributed portfolio, the company can lead the market it is helping to create.

name: UpNest
description: UpNest is an innovative real estate agent marketplace connecting home buyers and sellers with highly qualified local agents who compete for their businesses. Since launch, UpNest has facilitated billions of dollars in home sales, and saved consumers millions of dollars in commissions. UpNest is awarded Technology Fast 500 by Deloitte, and Inc500 Fastest Growing Company by Inc. Magazine in 2018 and 2019.

name: ActiveRain
description: Based in Seattle, WA, ActiveRain is the largest and most active professional social network and blogging platform in the real estate industry.  Their roots go back almost 7 years but unlike many new ''real estate technology'' companies they are not trying to change the business model, but rather provide the technology to augment an existing one. Over the years they have worked very closely with agents and companies both large and small, providing the technology to support their core business, selling homes. Their goal is to ''empower the real estate professional'' and as an extension empower the consumer. They don't believe in placing additional barriers between the consumer and the agent. In June 2006, they launched the ActiveRain Real Estate Network, a free social network and marketing platform for real estate professionals. This network helps agents to create business relationships both within the industry and with the consumer. Today, ActiveRain attracts more than 2 million visitors per month and generates more than 2 million pieces of original content per year. ActiveRain is number one source of peer to peer training in the real estate year.

name: MeQasa Ltd
description: MeQasa offers an online platform that enables its users to rent, buy, and sell properties. With comprehensive listings of houses, apartments, condos, office spaces, and short stays, the company offers efficient and user friendly way to get its users through a stress less property search through online and offline media. Featured agents of the company are Signature Properties, Layoco Limited, EASTMIDAS PROPERTIES, Tierra Consult, Loveridge Properties and Consult, and Ando Properties Limited. The company collaborates with brokers, owners, and tenants to create complete and dynamic property profiles and they advertise online all adequately profiled properties that are vacant. MeQasa is headquartered in Ghana and the company was founded in 2013.

name: Greenzie
description: Greenzie develops software for autonomous robotic lawn mowers to reduce the labor costs of lawn maintenance. Its retrofit hardware kit and cloud-based software for commercial lawn mowers add self-driving to the existing equipment. The company was founded in 2018 and is headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: OpenHomes
description: OpenHomes Inc. connects home buyers and sellers through an online and offline residential real estate platform. OpenHomes allows qualified buyers instant, secure access to see a home in person, essentially making every day an open house. OpenHomes empowers buyers and sellers to safely and directly communicate and transact, when and how they want to – reducing transaction costs and agent interference.

name: bySTORED
description: Forget self-storage, our service makes storing everything from your winter wardrobe to the entirety of your family home completely stress free. No matter what size unit you’re after, head to our website to book a pick up straight away, see our great prices and chat to our in-house experts.  From free pick-ups to packing/disassembly (and the same on return) – our 2-man expert teams do all the hard work, so you don’t have to lift a finger if you don’t wish to.

name: Partly
description: Partly is a trusted community platform that connects people who want to solve their everyday household tasks with trusted and background-checked professionals. Partly can help you with a variety of household tasks such as socket installation, dishwasher repair, furniture assembly, home cleaning and even animal care. Come online or download a mobile app, and Partly will help you turn your to-do list into a list of completed tasks.

name: Spacehop
description: Spacehop is an online platform for people to list and book affordable and flexible office space in residential properties around London and the UK. Their easy-to-use platform allows for the flexibility to select the days, hours and kind of workspace required.  As a platform, Spacehop provides independent workers and small businesses with greater choice and flexibility when finding a place to work. With half the working population predicted to be self-employed by 2020, we are seeing a change in the way people work. Spacehop offers a timely solution that will benefit both hopper and the host. Founded in January 2016 by Matthew Beatty, Luke Eastwood and Joe Grimes, Spacehop is currently headquartered in London, UK.

name: Grasshopper Solar
description: Grasshopper is a long-time advocate of green energy, with the conviction it will simply make our province a better place for families to live, work and grow. Since starting up in 2007, they have provided energy solutions to homeowners, farmers, municipalities, school boards and large corporations. At Grasshopper, they’re here to address your specific needs. Their team understands a solar project requires the interconnection of key individuals with the ability to materialize the economic, environmental and social advantages of this elegant technology. They’re committed to providing you with a customized solution and exceptional customer service from start to finish.

name: OpenSensors
description: OpenSensors is an internet of things company building a connected world that puts people first. It has built a scalable real time IoT messaging engine that can easily process millions of messages a second from any internet connected device. It enables users to quickly create real time smart IoT products by giving the components needed, such as real time data access, security, storage, data analytics, and machine learning. OpenSensors was founded on 2014 and is headquartered in 2014.

name: HEARTWORK, Inc.
description: HEARTWORK is a designer and retailer of modern furniture and accessories for creative and inspiring workspaces. We believe great design makes oneʼs workspace more productive and enjoyable. Whether you are working alone, in pairs or on teams, your place of work should reflect your companyʼs unique culture and allow you to work your best. HEARTWORK's mission is to support innovative businesses and the passionate individuals who drive them with creative and inspiring workspaces. Designed for your pleasure and productivity. “Nobody changed the world surrounded by beige.”

name: POPSPACES
description: Simplify. This is our favorite word. We believe in a lease process that doesn’t take up too much of your time and not only allows retail markets to become increasingly accessible but goes further and promotes incredible experiences for consumers. So why not join the forces of the real estate and retail markets and facilitate their connection so that brands are able to implement their projects at the same time as property owners earn through their empty spaces? That is how POPSPACES arose, as a platform to help people and brands to find the right place to get great ideas off the drawing board. We provide suggestions and, by means of short-term leases, it’s possible to find the ideal space for your needs: pop-up stores, showrooms and events. All is done quickly, easily and safely. So, let’s find your perfect space?

name: Casagem
description: Casagem provides web based data collection and data-processing tools for the homecare industry. The toll allows underutilized homecare nurses and support workers to complete mandatory on-site homecare forms via tablet. The company is based in Toronto, Canada. The process of finding homecare is a disorganized emotional, and financial, nightmare. Current search methods include asking for referrals from friends, family, co-workers, employers, insurance providers, physicians, geriatric specialists, the internet, or the phonebook. Homecare-seekers interview as many as ten providers before choosing one and homecare-providers conduct as many as six interviews for every client they sign. CASAGEM is eHarmony for homecare. We match homecare-seekers with homecare-providers based on a comprehensive self-assessment that can be completed at home or at a hospital bedside. Thorough completion of the self-assessment is incentivized every step of the way with free or reduced-rate products and services that are directly related to the homecare-seeker’s illnesses or chronic conditions. Homecare providers are delivered 'hot leads' direct to a custom-built, homecare-specific, customer relationship management tool (CRM).

name: Wealthi
description: Wealthi is a real estate investment platform. Our mission is to help people build wealth through property, so they can achieve their life ambitions. We provide the roadmap, tools and expertise to guide and simplify the entire journey. Founded by industry professionals who have sold in excess of $1bn in brand new property projects. We partner with companies who value long term relationships with their buyers, have a high sense of integrity and a commitment to quality. Each day, our team is innovating and building a movement, powered by passion, discipline and an amazing work ethic. Wealthi is accelerated by Pi Labs, Europe's leading proptech VC firm.

name: TreeHouse
description: Led by Co-founder and CEO Jason Ballard, TreeHouse specializes in curated products and services that promote sustainable spaces, with an emphasis on high performance and design. It sells building materials, home systems, finishes & adhesives, kitchen, bath, lighting and flooring products as well as hardware and tools.

name: vilisto GmbH
description: vilisto saves companies and municipalities up to 40% of heating energy without any effort for the customers by using fully automated radiator thermostats. The digital heat management solution is based on thermostats with an integrated presence detection, learning algorithms and room climate sensors. While the thermostats control the room temperatures fully automated and demand-based, the connected web portal allows for a central and efficient management of the property portfolio.

name: lemonKey
description: lemonKey is the real estate radically different from ''integral management'' for owners. lemonKey offers you a service system to help increase the activity and presence of your property. Next, they present the first services of the range.lemonKey, the real estate 24/7 platform in Spain, the real estate radically different for owners, whether you sell or rent your house. Without Exclusives Without small print.

name: The Porch Pod
description: A 2019 report showed that 38% of Online shoppers reported that they've personally had a package stolen.  We aim to put a stop to package theft with the world's smartest package safe. Our product combines a rugged package safe with IoT technology, powered by our proprietary software to stop package theft in its tracks.

name: Luxify.com
description: Luxify is an online marketplace for buying and selling new, vintage and pre-owned luxury goods. From yachts to cars to jewellery and designer handbags, Luxify is a seamless way to exchange the world's most exclusive and prestigious brands. With headquarters in Hong Kong, Luxify also has offices in Singapore and London.

name: Cloudstaff
description: Cloudstaff is a premium cloud-based workforce provider that helps businesses to grow and achieve greater sustainability by providing high-quality staff, world-class facilities, and removing the burdens of recruitment, HR, and payroll. With over 2,500 staff serving its global client base, Cloudstaff provides the next generation of outsourcing for businesses built for 2020 and beyond.

name: 123makler
description: 123makler is a transparent and big data marketplace for the realtor industry. It allows homeowners to find the right realtor for their property. 123makler ranks realtors according to their experience and records of accomplishment with properties. It also enables homeowners to contract realtors directly through its website. Based in Berlin, Germany, 123makler was launched in 2015.

name: Zingat
description: Zingat, operating in cooperation with REIDIN and Doğuş Group in 2015, is a reliable real estate information and marketing platform that adopts quality service and transparent information understanding and brings together real estate professionals and individuals with accurate, comprehensive reference information under one roof.

name: Inhabitr
description: Inhabitr is a furniture rental platform that lets users rent furniture at an affordable price. It uses a mix of AI-powered technology with a supply chain solution to offer a wide variety of furniture options curated by in-house designers. Inhabitr was founded in 2016 and is headquartered in Chicago, Illinois.

name: STRATIS IoT
description: STRATIS deployed in 1 in 5 new US Multifamily Developments while establishing offices in UK/EU. STRATIS became the sole provider to Google Nest Smart Thermostat Fleet Management Platform and Lutron Lighting Systems for multifamily and student housing. STRATIS earned a National Renewable Energy Lab/Wells Fargo grant to create digital twin technology for energy metering and monitoring efficiency forecasting in multifamily and student housing. And STRATIS doubled its revenue for the seventh year in a row, leading to 6th place on Best Companies in America by Entrepreneur Magazine and a 148 place audited acceleration on the INC 5000 to #740 fastest growing company in America, as well as 5th fastest growing company in Greater Philadelphia according to The Philadelphia Inquirer and the Philadelphia Business Journal. STRATIS is the most groundbreaking and pioneering Internet of Things (IoT) Software Platform in the world. STRATIS enables smart apartments and intelligent buildings and is the first and only software platform of its kind built for the complexities of multifamily and student housing. STRATIS’ mission is to increase energy and resource efficiencies and reduce the carbon footprint of commercial residential buildings around the world.  To do this, STRATIS enables smart devices like smart sensors, light switches and outlets, smart thermostats, and HVAC equipment, smart water meters and heaters, smart load centers, and more, to be connected on one collaborative dashboard and mobile application, so that Property Managers and their Residents can automate energy and water savings, without reducing comfort.  Since re-launch in 2015, STRATIS has installed in over 350,000 apartments across the U.S. and has launched in Japan, the UK, EU, and China. STRATIS now serves hospitality, retail, small to mid-size commercial, and innovative agriculture, as well.

name: Campsyte
description: Where nature meets city. Unlocking hidden outdoor spaces in the city for social experiences. Find a favorite outdoor space of your own and be inspired. When you think of a campsite, you imagine a nostalgic experience spent amongst friends and family in the outdoors. We at Campsyte believe that this state of mind, often in leisure and travel, is also needed in our daily lives and accessible in our cities. Campsyte makes it easy to find, book and access unique outdoor space for social experiences. Whether planning an activity, team offsite, happy hour, birthday, or special occasion, make it an outing to be remembered. Campsyte was created with a vision to build happier cities. Our cities have become less affordable and more fragmented, and Campsyte seeks to give people the sense of ownership and belonging, and together build happier cities. Campsyte offers affordable, convenient, and personalized outdoor space with the goal to be the world’s largest social space.

name: JustCo
description: JustCo operates a co-working space chain intended to empower communities with workplace flexibility and experiences. Its offerings include working spaces that are equipped with ergonomically-friendly chairs and furniture with non-core services such as IT, security, and admin, and curated events, networking sessions and strategic partnerships, enabling businesses of all shapes and sizes to challenge and redefine collaborative working and connect with like-minded and dynamic communities.

name: The Wadhwa Group
description: Wadhwa Group is a mumbai based real estate company. They are proud to develop iconic and state of the art, yet practical structure. Their promise to customers is to provide highest standards of quality in Design, Technology and Materials. All these pillars endeavour to give our occupiers highest value.

name: Bin-e
description: Bin-e is an AI-based smart waste bin, designed for office spaces and smart buildings, enabling them to achieve efficiency in waste management and reach green strategy goals. It combines most advanced technology to simplify recycling and facilitate the transition to a circular economy. It sorts and compresses the waste automatically, controls the fill level and processes data for convenient waste management. The smart waste bin recognizes the type of waste thanks to an AI-based recognition system and sorts it to the relevant chamber. Plastics and papers are compressed to decrease the volume. The collection service gets notified automatically when one of the bins inside is full. Each device can be easily managed via an app that shows the fill level of each bin, real-time data and summary statistics. An integrated IoT-Platform provides valuable insights into waste management operations that can be used to optimize collection routes, and save costs, time and labour of waste disposal. Bin-e is an excellent solution for easy and resource-efficient recycling in smart buildings. It enables the recovery of high-quality raw material and the reduction of CO2 emissions of waste transport.

name: SmartBeings
description: SmartBeings is an information technology company that specializes in AI technologies,VaaS), Facial Recognition, and Cloud-based AI platforms. It features WooHoo an AI-embedded device designed to organize multiple home devices. It utilizes a 360-degree camera, and full video integration and intuitive, and software. WooHoo enables users to manage all connected home devices from any location. The company was founded in 2015 and headquartered in California, United States.

name: Workero
description: Workero is a technology platform enabling mobility and interaction between companies and workers by offering creative work-spaces in their respective office locations. It's a simple idea that transforms idle work-spaces into places where companies and workers can connect and share knowledge. Workero gives rise to new business opportunities and nurtures innovation, collaboration and co-creation. They are a professional network connecting companies and digital nomads, the workforce of the future.

name: GuestOf
description: With GuestOf, companies can launch faster and spend less by integrating our scalable platform and hardware into whatever product they’re building to automate and manage authentication, access control, event logging and other processes. They can then kick off actions, enable analytics, and more in their own software. Our highly customizable back-end does the heavy lifting, providing a customer solution with the data and control it needs.

name: BoxMySpace
description: BoxMySpace is a unique space solution, that helps you make space in your urban life. People today are living in smaller and smaller houses and do not have the luxury of space to keep all their things and that's where They come in. They bring storage at your doorsteps. All you need to do is pack the things in Their high quality storage boxes and They will store them safely for you. With convenience being taken for granted in urban cities, be it booking a cab or ordering food; They still strive to make your storage experience simple and hassle-free.

name: Centriq
description: Centriq is the platform for the smarter home. It is one place for homeowners to turn for all the important information in the house, easily accessible through their smartphone - bringing user manuals, spare parts (and easy ordering through Amazon), maintenance alerts, how to videos from experts, and so much more, all in a free award-winning easy to use consumer app. Co-founded by two executives from Salesforce who simply thought there should be a better way to manage all of the information in their own homes.

name: Spark CRM
description: Spark CRM is an online platform specifically designed to power the entire process of selling and marketing real estate. Using technology to help turn leads into buyers, inventory into contracts, and information into usable metrics. Spark is a safe, secure and cost-effective solution for selling and marketing real estate.  They are all about creating the perfect sales management software and helping real estate professionals sell more homes. Spark CRM aims to advance real estate software through intuitive design and forward-thinking technology; creating a solution built around the end-user, but designed for the business.

name: GoWork
description: GoWork is a facility service company providing an all-inclusive flexible office and co-working space. The company also provides a perfect environment for start-ups to work, grow, collaborate, and flourish. It is a space that will house entrepreneurs, accelerators, enterprises seeking technology, investors, and advisories among others. GoWork aims to create dreams, idealize innovations and bring ease of access to technology, thus helping shape a revolution that will fast-track the Indian start-up dream. The facility develops a mature ecosystem of Entrepreneurship by breaking the barrier of information, access, investment, and technology. GoWork was founded in 2017 and is headquartered in Gurgaon, Haryana, India.

name: Olympia Group
description: Olympia Group is one of South India’s leading developers. Founded in July 2004, the group has developed over 2000 homes and over 5 million square feet successfully. With an emphasis on highest quality, detailing, exceptional design and craftsmanship, Olympia Group has been leading the real estate market in Chennai, Kolkata, and Bangalore.

name: Syncbnb
description: Syncbnb is a calendar synchronization tool for vacation rental home owners that want to list their property on multiple channels and need a tool to help them avoid double bookings. We employ cutting edge software, Advanced AI and Human Quality Assurance, to ensure 100% success rate in updating calendars, offering a solution to the most important problem of current vacation rental owners and managers.

name: Click Notices, Inc.
description: Click Notices, Inc. is the leading Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) provider of delinquency management services to the multifamily property industry. The company’s cloud-hosted platform and expert staff offload the administrative burden of managing late rent, evictions, and other landlord-tenant disputes. Every month, ClickNotices handles thousands of late rent cases, helping property managers control delinquencies, reduce legal spend, and automate operations.

name: BuyRentKenya.com
description: Established in 2012, Buyrentkenya.com has rapidly become the no.1 property portal in Kenya and the country's 12th most popular website. Nominated at the 2013 CIO100 Annual Awards after only 6 months of launching, Buyrentkenya.com is one of the fastest growing companies in the region and the property portal of choice.With a focus on creating the largest real estate community of buyers, sellers, renters, brokers and developers, they provide visitors with comprehensive search facilities covering residential and commercial properties alongside complementary tools and information built on our unique market leading technology.Every month, over 160,000 visitors use Buyrentkenya.com to access more than 10,000 up-to-date listings for residential and commercial properties, as well as local real estate news, market trends, home styling, expert advice and useful guides on buying and selling.

name: ITInvolve
description: ITinvolve creates Cross-Team Workspaces that bring the right people, tools, information and analysis together to help teams do their jobs more effectively. Supporting workspaces for development and infrastructure projects, IT management processes, what-if scenarios, and environment analysis, ITinvolve is the application where IT and the business work together to achieve greater agility while ensuring operational stability and quality. Less searching, less guesswork, and fewer silos – that’s People Powered.

name: CENTERSONIC
description: CENTERSONIC is the easy way to build your smart home It's a vendor independent Smarthome-solution which features easy installation, configuration and operation. It makes your everyday life even more comfortable: controlling lights, dimmer switches, shutters and blinds, heating, smoke detectors, hifi, temperature sensors, door- and window sensors, surveillance cameras, telephones, TV sets, audio and video components.

name: 24 Storage
description: We at 24Storage rent stores in many different sizes for both individuals and businesses. Long or short time. But we also tend to say that we are developing the third generation of self-storage properties. By that we mean that we create a new system that makes it possible to build smaller properties, find better positions closer to the customer and create a better and more flexible solution for the customer. As a customer, you no longer have to travel far out of town to access their gadgets. 24Storage AB was formed in early 2015. The founders and owners have over 20 years experience in the self storage industry as a partner and leader of the company, Shurgard Europe (Europe's leading self storage operator), SelStor AB and Pelican Self Storage. The founders have been involved and responsible for the establishment of over 100 self storage facilities in seven countries in Europe. In September 2015, we purchased Stockholm Storage in Sundbyberg, a smaller plant with development potential, but also a good pilot plant to develop our concept. At the same time, we bought a property in central Tyreso. The facility will be the first full-scale 24Storage plant in operation. From November 2, 2015, we own and operate Humlans mini camp with seven plants in western Sweden. The plant located in Gothenburg was founded in 1988 and was the first self storage facility in Sweden. From February 1, 2016, we own and operate the Mini-Store . A smaller facility centrally located in Boras. Mini-Store, started operations in late 2013 that Boras first self storage facility. As of June 1, 2016 we change the names of all companies and will pursue all activities under the brand 24STORAGE .

name: TheHouseShop.com
description: The House Shop is a property marketplace, working with homeowners, landlords, estate agents, and developers to buy, sell, rent, and let property online. It offers a range of services for both homeowners and estate agents, and also provides buyers and tenants with a property search that includes a range of homes for sale and to let.

name: People Squared
description: We believe that '' the power that people +people overlay can be achieved, is beyond the effect of people x 2''. It is this kind of mindset, which grows at an exponential rate, that gives the rise to the name of People Squared. Since its inception in 2010, People Squared's office has given birth to a Statup Coworking Space Society as well as P2S(People Squared Service) startup coworking space, providing resource and support for hundreds of startup events. Using Yan Ping Attic and Light Office as a benchmark, People Square is whole-hearted to provide office space, services and resources. As the very first P2S startup coworking space, the Basecamp provides People Squared standardized services to office space that is already in place. We hope People Squared can lend a helping hand to statups on their road to success.

name: Factory Berlin
description: Factory Berlin is an ecosystem of over 3,000 members from more than 70 nations located on two campuses. Gathering the most ambitious creators from the tech, creative and corporate industries, we curate our diverse community to connect, collaborate and thrive together. As a platform for active networking, our digital products, spaces, startup labs, events, and programs encourage new connections to impact our surroundings and world. Supported by partners like Riverside Studios Berlin, Sonar+D, Google for Startups, CODE University, and Hackerbay, the Factory Berlin culture empowers creators to build a better world.

name: SOL VISTA
description: Skywalk, SOL VISTA’s proprietary SaaS platform, empowers commercial building owners and managers to improve the performance and profitability of their buildings. Skywalk’s features and functionality have evolved from ongoing iteration driven by the subscribers we serve. The platform now interacts directly with over 100 utilities throughout the U.S. and serves hundreds of buildings saving our subscribers millions of dollars in utility costs each year, while also significantly reducing their environmental footprint.  With hundreds of hotels served, Skywalk subscribers benefit from one of the largest databases of cross-brand, hotel building performance data. This vast dataset allows for a more accurate picture of how subscribed buildings compare to peer buildings across numerous industry-specific building performance metrics and within individual markets. In addition to the platform’s internal benchmarking capabilities, it also connects directly to ENERGY STAR Portfolio Manager for building benchmarking and compliance reporting in all benchmarking mandated jurisdictions. Beyond efficiently aggregating, exchanging, and warehousing ongoing data, Skywalk provides industry-leading analytics to provide actionable intelligence that empowers subscribers to continuously optimize utility rates and building efficiency.

name: Plarity
description: Plarity is organizing the sum of all real estate knowledge. Think of us like a Wikipedia for the physical world, providing intelligence on every property, owner, and professional in the market. We recognized that the real estate information market needed more than a better product or tool. It needed a new governing philosophy – one based on the ideal that by harnessing the communal knowledge of the market rather than working with a black box in isolation, all professionals would be better off, spending less time chasing dead ends and more time creating value. We provide a framework for collaboration and an ecosystem within which the market can see beyond the data and expose the unseen relationships necessary to create their next opportunity.

name: LetMeSpace
description: Letmespace.com provided via a digital platform service renting space for storage / parking private . Overall, we respond to a problem of lack of space in the urban environment. And service level addresses the current difficulty of finding a storage service / closer to home and reasonable parking fee .

name: Clicbrics
description: Clicbrics is an online real estate marketplace for buyers across all segments. From first time home buyers to buyers of properties across all categories, Clicbrics empowers the consumers with data and full knowledge of the properties which they want to call home. Clicbrics relationship managers are there for you all along the process of searching for a home, guiding the customers along the way, with site visits from our experienced and trusted in house property advisory team to help the customers get the best homes based on their requirements. We constantly update our consumers on the construction progress of their homes till their homes are delivered to the customers, as well as providing services post the possession of their home. Clicbrics team consists of professionals from all segments of real estate, e.g online real estate, real estate private equity, developers and builders, as well as local experts from real estate brokerage and consultancy services.

name: Dwellsy
description: Dwellsy is an internet company that specializes in the fields of consumer applications, internet, and property management. It features a web-based platform for residential home rentals, built on the radical concept that true, organic search in a free eco-system creates more value than the pay-to-play model embraced by all of the current rental listing services. The company was founded in 2019 and headquartered in Los Altos, California.

name: Done.
description: Done.com, Inc. strives to connect consumers to efficient and guaranteed home & commercial service featuring transparent pricing, executed through personalized care from top service providers. Founded in Austin, Texas, Done.com's goal is to make service shopping as easy as product shopping. Done.com's team is made up of previous service business owners, so the company knows what it takes to connect customers and providers. Done.com's team understands the complicated nature of service pricing and has set out to make it easier for customers and businesses alike.

name: Green Energy Options
description: Green Energy Options designs and produces in-home energy displays, online energy services, and mobile applications. It focuses on the energy element of the smart home and aims to make energy smarter and help customers save money on energy bills. It operates with a wide range of business customer from utility companies to retail partners, bringing smarter energy innovations to homes. Since 2006, the company have developed more than 25 products, sold upwards of 4 million energy monitoring systems. The innovations have earned the company a 2017 Queen’s Award for Enterprise and ranked at no. 60 in the 2017 Sunday Times Hiscox Tech Track 100 (2016, no. 39). Green Energy Options was founded on 2006 and is based in Cambridge, United Kingdom.

name: TripVillas
description: Tripvillas is a website that allows travelers to book Holiday Homes and Homestays instead of Hotels and Resorts. This is a win-win proposition where Owners who use such properties rarely make additional income and Travelers get to stay in large spacious family homes in some of the most beautiful places in the world. The website was founded in late 2009 by Roshan D'Silva when looking for ways to generate additional income from Coffee Plantations owned by his family. Inspired by Craigslist, Roshan set out to create a simple website where owners of private homes could create a simple profile for their property and then correspond with like minded families who would be interested in staying in their homes as an alternate to hotels.

name: Banyan Water
description: Founded in 2011, Banyan Water provides smart water management as a service for commercial and institutional businesses using real-time technologies and related services to save money and enhance properties. The company helps businesses find and maintain water savings opportunities throughout their portfolios. The company serves business decision-makers in the hospitality, property management, real estate investment, living community, landscaping, and academic sectors

name: Callida Energy Inc.
description: Callida Energy offers a learning software solution for commercial facilities to decrease energy use, costs and carbon emissions while improving occupant comfort. Callida is unique in combining occupant-based control (we turn down cooling or heating when no one is in the office), with monitoring of consumption & demand and predictive control to create optimal HVAC operating plans, achieving up to 30+% savings. Callida has been installed in commercial real estate and municipal sites.

name: Smart Furniture
description: SmartFurniture.com is the pioneer of Design-On-Demand® which combines web based visualization technologies and mass customization to provide customers with personalized furniture products that are uniquely suited to each customer's needs and preferences. Through innovative technologies such as its new application SmartSpace™, Smart Furniture empowers customers to see how their personalized furniture will look in the context of their own spaces quickly and easily. Known across the industry for its innovative technologies and elite customer service, Smart Furniture continues to earn industry-wide acclaim and dramatic sales growth.

name: Rate My Agent
description: Ratemyagent.com.au is Australia’s No. 1 real estate agent ratings and statistics website. It provides recommendations, rankings and reviews for real estate agents in Australia. For people active in the Australian property market, the real estate sector is incredibly cryptic and difficult to research. Ironic considering that buying/selling a property is one of the biggest transactions most people will make in their lifetimes. Ratemyagent.com.au provides a platform where property buyers and sellers can freely consider the feedback and experiences of others, combined with facts and statistics demonstrating real estate agent’s performance across a number of key measures. Vendors rely on ratemyagent.com.au when searching for, shortlisting, and ultimately engaging the right agent to sell their property. All of the agents and agencies are freely available to search. We don’t want your personal details and are not trying to access agent’s commissions For buyers, ratemyagent.com.au helps them find and follow leading agents who are selling the types of properties they want to buy. It is also a valuable resource for buyers to research and understand the professional they are negotiating with.

name: Edgar Smart Concierge
description: EDGAR is a digital concierge service for Vacation Rental: Hosts can customize their own app concierge and invite their Guests to discover and book both internal and external services. Edgar has an internal marketplace of local experiences and services, plus other service integrations to provide the Guests with all the services they need. Hosts can easily manage the requests and interact with their guest even after their stay. We implement a combination of a B2B and a B2C model: hosts pay an annual fee depending on the number of rooms/apartments, plus we retain a transaction fee on every experience and service that Guest book through the app.

name: Blerp
description: Blerp is a technology company focused on building great products that empower people to create and express their digital voice. Blerp is the search engine for soundbites. We’re able to quickly source and build our content through our platform integrations with Twitch, Discord, Messaging apps, and Voice assistants. Blerp users can discover, share, and create audio content which we use to power our API and platform. Through our indexing and audio transcription tools, we plan to power the future of digital expression aka take the potential that gifs have in messaging into the voice space.

name: Bonito
description: They’re a small but cute firm. Each of their team member take up a very special and unique role when it comes to designing and executing projects. They can say to an extent that each of the team members form unique pieces of puzzle which makes sense only when they’re together and there is no big piece or small piece in a puzzle.

name: ParkBee
description: ParkBee allows private car parks monetize underutilized spaces by making them bookable to the public. It makes private parking garages (for example from office buildings and hotels) available to the public. Creating affordable and top located parking opportunities for the consumer, and an extra stream of income over unused assets for building owners.

name: DesignerInc
description: Founded in 2018, DesignerInc.com is a ground-breaking B2B sourcing and purchasing platform for the professional design industry. DesignerInc.com is the most comprehensive trade-only sourcing and purchasing platform for the professional design industry. Amassing hundreds of thousands of trade-only furniture and decor product with unprecedented depth and breadth, DesignerInc.com offers a seamless solution to source and purchase furniture and decor for interior designers. And with $77 billion of furniture and decor product purchased via designers, DesignerInc.com brings much needed efficiency to this enormous, yet low-tech, industry.

name: Josh.ai
description: Josh is a voice controlled home automation system. Like Siri or Google Now, the Josh programming language is built to support natural language voice commands. This includes greetings, questions, instructions, and more. Further, Josh is built to control and connect any “smart” device, from any device. For example, with Josh you can turn on your speakers from your watch, change the temperature from your phone, shut off the lights from your desktop, etc. Initially, Josh will be focused on the smart home, but over time they envision a more general-purpose AI. Josh will go where you go, making your life easier and more productive.

name: Simplifa
description: The PropTech startup Simplifa offers real estate owners an all-round service in the area of elevator management with the help of smart building and Internet of Things technologies and already manages more than 1,000 elevator systems today. Elevators are a pain point for their owners: The operation and maintenance costs of the elevator generate some of the highest costs per square feet in the property and elevator downtimes cause extreme user dissatisfaction, high administrative burden for property managers and can even lead to justified rent reductions. Implementing operational obligations, such as maintenance, documentation and repair, lies in the primary responsibility of the property owners. However, due to high cost and often lack of expertise, this happens usually not only inefficiently, but also involves legal risks, for example due to failure to employ maintenance measures. In addition, there is a high information asymmetry between owner / property manager and elevator maintenance company, which often leads to disproportionately high maintenance costs. Simplifa structures, optimizes, and manages elevator portfolios for its customers. The startup serves as a central point of contact for owners and elevator service companies and acts as an expert on an equal footing in negotiations. Each elevator undergoes a technical inspection and is recorded in 360° shots to simulate a virtual “elevator twin”. In the event of system malfunctions, the maintenance company can ensure a much faster and more targeted repair thanks to the ''elevator twin'' without prior dispatch of a technician. Thanks to Simplifa, the operating and maintenance costs of the elevators are regularly reduced by about 30% while maintaining the same quality. In the future, the transmission of sensor data will provide a manufacturer-independent real-time analysis for a predictive maintenance system, which will reduce the manual test frequency of the elevators and avoid costly downtimes in advance.

name: Sensgreen
description: Sensgreen improves indoor environmental conditions in commercial real estates with its AI-powered models, plug and play sensors. Our analysis and prediction technology built with reinforced learning algorithms and years of experience in building sciences. On top of that, we are capable of developing advanced wireless sensors to collect real-time data to improve our models constantly. Adaptive and user-friendly mobile app customized by each user allowing an overview of their environment within seconds, which makes Sensgreen unique in commercial built environment. Currently operational in the Middle East and Southeast Asia, Sensgreen is backed by Techstars and HUB71.

name: NextSpace
description: NextSpace is a collaborative coworking community that solves two fundamental problems for its members. First, NextSpace provides access to professional infrastructure: cool workspace, internet, conference rooms, and a diverse network of dedicated professionals representing the startup scene, B2B services, digital advertising, design, architecture, and engineering, to name a few. Second, NextSpace provides the creative community that so many freelancers and independents seek as a source for inspiration, collaboration, and client referrals.  Every NextSpace location is set up to accommodate a variety of workstyles, from open and collaborative to heads-down and deadline driven; and from flexible day passes to dedicated workstations and private offices.

name: Habity
description: Habity is a housing community that creates value and accessibility for (in this moment) Sweden's entire homes. Here, your and all other homes in Sweden are in focus. Whether you own or rent your home, Habity is the app for your current and future living. Here you will find all Sweden's homes, whether they are for sale or not, in a place that will make it easier to buy, rent, manage and sell their homes.

name: SkyCandle
description: “Love where you live”, our motto in Skycandle.in, it's about connecting to our deepest knowledge about what makes us feel nurtured, comfortable, safe and happy in a particular space. At Skycandle.in, our aim is to become the ultimate online shopping destination for home decor products in India. We wish to provide an easier, simpler and a faster shopping experience at Skycandle.in. We showcase only the best quality product for our customer which include Candles, Sky Lanterns, Wall Decor, Hanging Decor, Aroma Products and Lights and gift packs. Our shopping experience is 100% safe and we provide services like free shipping and returns across the nation, 100% money back guarantee, and secure online payment options and Cash On Delivery (Available on all products).

name: Campfire
description: Campfire Collaborative Spaces are industry focused workspaces that were designed to provide every tools and services possible for members to grow. Campfire was conceptualized as a place where like-minded entrepreneurs can gather to share their experiences and work together. It offers reliable and flexible sites to maximize utilization. Its sites have been designed to provide every tool and service possible for members to grow.

name: Better Place Forests
description: Better Place Forests provides memorial spreading forests for families who choose cremation. It offers a sustainable alternative to cemeteries by turning some of the most beautiful places in America into protected spreading forests. Better Place Forests support the growing majority of people who choose cremation at the end of their lives, but have no beautiful, protected and private place to return their ashes to the earth. Instead of a tombstone, the company incorporates ashes into the soil of a tree. Better Place Forests aims to provide every person the opportunity to leave the legacy of a more beautiful world by memorializing their ashes in the most beautiful and iconic locations in North America.

name: Sdelano
description: Sdelano is a full-stack startup for home renovation which operates an online apartment repair service platform created to optimize the repair process. The company's online apartment repair service offers comprehensive fixed-price repairs to key apartments, it enables user choose the design, and ensures to deliver the finished apartment just in time. The company was established in 2015 and is headquartered in Moscow, Russia.

name: Protein for Pets
description: Protein for Pets is an online pet food store that arranges the products by food types and prices. The food products are natural, protein-based and free of wheat, soy, and corn. Their branded line of NAKED products is stripped of all fillers, comes in raw frozen, freeze dried, and in kibble forms. Protein for Pets is a U.S.-based company that was founded in 2014.

name: InsureStreet Ltd.
description: We all know and feel the hardship experienced in renting. Paying agents fees, six-eight weeks deposit plus four weeks rent is no picnic. en Our Rent Passport™ provides renters with a digital renter identity and replaces cash deposits with a risk based insurance premium.  Through our partnership with HISCOX, we will offer a range of insurance & non-Insurance based services.

name: Navigator CRE
description: NavigatorCRE, enables the alignment of data and program functionality into a single secure operating system to empower our members. Offering a core platform to strategize, manage and execute with greater effectiveness and efficiency. NavigatorCRE delivers immediate, live-data visualizations responding instantly to filtered queries. Identify strategies regarding market trends, opportunities, individual property or portfolio details with integrated performance analytics critical to core business purposes.

name: Domestina
description: Domestina is a VC funded, fast growing startup company which offers housemaid services in a novel and very progressive way. It helps cleaning businesses to better manage their operations and allows customers to order cleaning services from different rated providers. Having a system that facilitates all interactions between cleaners and clients, Domestina is enabled to scale to thousands of employees.

name: FilKhedma
description: FilKhedma is the largest home services marketplace in Egypt. Users can book online quality guaranteed reliable service providers in home cleaning, maintenance and other services. Service providers apply online and are accepted after passing through the onboarding process after which they receive orders through a mobile app. The service operates in 3 Egyptian cities.

name: Realync
description: Realync empowers real estate professionals to connect with prospects and clients in real time. Using nothing more than a smartphone or tablet, users are able to interact via live tours and open houses or HD pre-recorded videos to truly experience spaces.  Partnered with major multifamily enterprises like Greystar, Equity, Fairfield, Waterton, Livcor, Milhaus and more, Realync is driving increased lead generation and conversion rates, while also decreasing time required for the overall sales cycle.  Our mission is to connect the world’s real estate markets and save time, money, and hassle for all parties by harnessing technology to promote collaboration and simplification of the real estate touring process. Simply put, our goal is to be the fabric of real time real estate on the web.

name: Brickspaces
description: Together with you we would like to bring your idea from the drawing board to the city center, the scene district, the next event location or wherever you want. With the experience of the last years of our work in the pop-up world, we have built up a broad portfolio and a unique network, through which they will certainly find the right space for your idea and your brand! Meanwhile, this portfolio covers more than 1,500 spaces in the entire German-speaking area, but this is only the tip of the iceberg. Every day we supplement our database with numerous new areas that are available for your ideas. And to help these ideas find exactly the right space to reach out to the public, we accompany you from the creation of an initial requirement profile through the search to the completed booking.

name: Properhands
description: ProperHands is a Singapore-based provider of home and office cleaning services. It provides this service through intelligent and automated matching of legal freelance cleaners to customer requests. This proprietary technology uses multiple data points including geolocation (finding jobs nearby), skill matching, preferences (can manage dogs), language matching (can speak English), among many other attributes in our database. This increases the quality of service to the customer as well as increases convenience and job fit for the freelance cleaner.

name: Sojourn
description: Accommodations on Airbnb are still inconsistent with no guarantee of quality, while hotel accommodations are unable to provide the local experience that today's traveler craves. Consumers want hotel quality combined with the value and experience of an Airbnb. Sojourn offers upscale, short-term rentals in high demand areas, with the consistency and quality of a hotel—guaranteed every time. We master lease whole residential buildings, furnish and design them to a high standard, and re-lease them as a mix of short-term rentals & “short-term rental friendly” long term rentals.

name: Cielo WiGle
description: Cielo Breez converts your existing or new air conditioners & heat pumps to smart ones. Helps you control your air conditioners from anywhere, anytime. Breez saves you up to 25% on your AC energy bills. It enhances your lifestyle, comfort and convenience. Helps you do away with your remote controls. Control your ACs through your smartphone or simple voice commands (Breez is Alexa & Google Home compatible). It is a plug & play device that gives you flexibility to control your air conditioners from anywhere through your smartphones. Breez works with majority of air conditioner brands and models in the market. It is a DIY product and extremely easy to setup. Breez will convert your existing or new air conditioner to smart air conditioner. You do not need to buy expensive smart air conditioners anymore - simply convert your existing air conditioners to smart ones. Breez automatically turns the air conditioner or heat pump OFF when you leave the premises and starts to cool/heat on your return as per your set schedule. Breez can reduce your ductless heating / cooling costs by up to 25%. Breez is fully compatible to various brands of ductless heating & cooling systems with remote controls. The associated ''Cielo Home'' app gives you complete control of your heating or cooling through Breez. It comes with a stylish display which adds to your home decor. The Breez smart controller controls your ductless heating / cooling via infrared, just like your remote control, and connects seamlessly through your home Wi-Fi router to the internet.''Cielo Home'' app figures out when you're at home and when you're out, adjusts the settings to provide comfort when people are in the home and energy savings when no one is at home. You can schedule your Air conditioners & heat pumps, get notifications about excessive usage, set appliance action in relation to your locations and unlimited controls from anywhere.

name: Firepoint Solutions
description: Firepoint is a SaaS Real Estate CRM and Business Intelligence Platform. We offer lead generation and management, customizable agent web sites with IDX integration, dialer services with call recording, and insightful reporting. Firepoint is a real estate software solution created by top real estate agents across the nation. We believe there is a simpler and more effective way to grow and run a real estate team. We offer an all-in-one lead management software solution that delivers transparency, accountability, and never-before-seen business reporting and analysis; all at a reasonable price. Software should work for you, not against you. Quite simply: our system was designed for agents by agents.

name: Mobile Doorman
description: Mobile Doorman we believe buildings need to go beyond the web portal and connect with residents on their mobile devices. After being frustrated with the ability to use our smartphones to interact with our building managers, we created an app that does just that. Our app is customizable, both in terms of branding and features for each building we serve.

name: The Qube
description: The Qube is a co-working business for artists, creators and creative entrepreneurs. Members share access to over 30 purpose built studios across music, podcast, film & photography as well as flexible desks and offices for creative professionals. The Qube's 16,000 sqft flagship West London site scheduled to open Autumn 2019.

name: Infabode
description: Infabode is the home of information for the Real Estate industry Connecting people with information: Infabode reduces the amount of time people spend trying to access key information from the Real Estate industry. Infabode connects its community of users with industry information from the Real Estate sector on one customisable online platform. We are solving the problem of information being spread across the web and the time constraints in accessing it. Currently, if you want to know about investment into the London Office Market for example, then you would search on Google. This is time consuming and relies on you clicking into a number of company websites, with a large about of information and data potentially being missed. So we created a free, secure, platform which allows this important disparate information, data and views to be held in one place. Our vision is to become the 'go to'

name: Orbit Corporation
description: The entrepreneurial spirit in the organisation can be traced to 1973 when Mr Ravi Kiran Aggarwal established a steel trading firm, soon to be followed by a venture in packaged foods. He entered the real estate sector in 1989 with the satellite township of Navi Mumbai. The year 2000 was a momentous year in the history of Orbit as it witnessed the genesis of Orbit Cybertech Limited, later rechristened, Orbit Corporation Limited, in 2006. OCL aimed to tap redevelopment opportunities in the Island city of Mumbai, specifically in the premium locales of South Mumbai.

name: Square Plums
description: It is India's leading chain of ''Branded'' rental homes for singles with presence in 5 cities and managing hundreds of properties. Square Plums makes it easy for singles to rent fully furnished homes in prime locations. All Square Plums homes are curated, designed and furnished with a lot of attention keeping in mind the unique requirements of singles. Once you live in a Square Plums rental home, you will not want to live anywhere else!For house owners, Square Plums offers the benefit of letting out a fully furnished house, with up to 50% higher rentals, without having to spend on furnishing the house. What's more, we assure fully vetted tenants with easy online documentation and no brokerage.

name: Jooxter
description: Jooxter develops an AI driven occupancy solution for workplaces. Its application, interacting with Smart Devices (IoT), enables innovative services for occupants and drives workplace efficiency.. It makes workplaces fully informed of occupant’s movements to create a peaceful and productive work environment. Jooxter was founded by Thomas Thelliez and Fabien Girerd in 2014; and is headquartered in Lille, France.

name: MadeComfy
description: MadeComfy is Australia's first performance based home sharing partner and a fast growing disrupter in the Real Estate and Travel market. We enable home and investment property owners to participate in the sharing economy boom by renting out their properties on the short term rental market. We generate over 40% higher returns than any other form of rental through our value adding end to end management service which includes furnishing& styling, pricing & marketing, booking & 24/7 guest management, check-in's/out's, housekeeping and maintenance. We also create unique experiences and a high level of comfort for our guests. Our customers (Hosts and Guests) come first and we do everything it takes to exceed their expectations.

name: Beroomers
description: Beroomers is the mid-term housing marketplace for students and young professionals, present in more than 50 destinations worldwide. They book their housing online in a safe and easy way before arriving to their next destination. Its community of landlords is renting +30.000 properties effortlessly and way in advance, reducing gaps between rentals. Beroomers has already helped tenants from 191 different nationalities and is the exclusive and official housing partner of Universia, the largest network of universities in Iberoamerica.

name: Fella Homes
description: Fella Homes is a branded chain of rental homes. Being synonymous with hassle-free and quality living, we aim to standardize the entire experience of finding and living in a rented home with the use of technology enabled product and services. Just with a click you open the door of options of finest rental homes in your choice of the locality which suits to your pocket. Fella branded rental homes provide fully furnished, ready to move in houses at an affordable rent for the working professionals. Our homes are well equipped with all sort of amenities like furniture, Washing Machine, LED, DTH, and much more. You need to move in with your personal luggage. - Simple and Easy - Just book your home/bed from our App or call us. - Hassle free procedure - You don't need to worry about the rent agreement and verification, it's all on us. - Maintenance - Just on a call we are @ your service. - Convenient mode of payment. With this app you can: - Search and explore Fella Homes locality-wise (Filtered Search) - Schedule visit to the house of your choice. - Route directions to our homes. We are in Gurgaon, Noida, and Greater Noida right now. We shall be coming to more cities soon.

name: TownSq
description: TownSq is a global company (formerly known as SocialCondo) that offers condominium management solutions. It also creates solutions to improve communication and organize life in condominiums. TownSq has an office in Texas, USA and was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in the Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil.

name: Corner Media, Inc.
description: Corner Media is a location-based digital media company with a focus on premier, high pedestrian traffic locations: the irreplaceable corners in local communities where brands can reach their ideal customers. Founded in 2011, Corner Media is powered by a mission: to free advertisers from the constraints of traditional out-of-home media and to help them reach the right consumers, at the right time, in the right location. We combine multi-channel advertising, digital out-of-home, in-app mobile ads, and innovative outdoor solutions in order to bring the newest digital technology and applications to one of the oldest forms of media. By doing so, we help advertisers reach and engage on-the-go, hard to reach consumers.

name: Spare Workspace
description: Founded in 2015, Spare Workspace was conceived out of the personal need of a workspace solution that was both affordable and available short-term. With rising rental prices and the long-term commitment of commercial leases, the option to find such a workspace was becoming increasingly difficult. This prompted the idea - businesses can share their existing workspace with others to reduce costs, share resources and engage with other businesses. Today, Spare Workspace ambitiously challenges the way people find and use workspace in Australia.

name: Fixd Repair
description: Fixd is an innovative mobile application and home warranty solution that is transforming the way homeowners file warranty claims, connect with service professionals, and schedule non-warranty home services. We leverage modern technology to provide a superior home warranty service. Fixd is a free, on-demand home service that connects qualified professionals with homeowners in need of repairs, installations, maintenance, and more. Fixd will be available on iOS and Android. Visit our website for more information.

name: Steerpath
description: Bridging employees, companies and real estate owners through an engaging mobile app to enable flexible cross use of spaces. Unleashing employee productivity through high availability of spaces anywhere at any time, in and outside of their office. Enabling corporations to operate their space leasing always at optimal level. Enabling real estate owners a way to lease their spaces at a higher rate per sqm. We enable global cross use of spaces through an engaging mobile app, filling the gap between employees, companies and real estate owners.

name: Suchirindia Infratech
description: SuchirIndia established in 2005, is one of the fastest growing group in the areas of Infrastructure, Real Estate and Hospitals sectors. The company headquartered in Hyderabad is building world class projects – railways (Infrastructure), affordable homes, luxury villas (Real Estate), and state of the art theme resorts (Hospitality) sectors.  SuchirIndia group with a rich, vibrant and diverse range of portfolio of projects, experience, expertise and exposure in executing large projects, possesses the necessary skills and capabilities, and is uniquely placed to take up the challenges in future by leveraging its core strength in industries such as Infrastructure, Real Estate and Hospitality.

name: eQ!
description: eQ! (EasyQasa) is a digital facility management platform that enables its users to find home cleaning services on a contract basis. in an affordable, simple and easy way. The company matches screened, background-checked and certified professional cleaner with house owners. The main goal is to reduce the time and costs of contracting home services. eQ! (EasyQasa) was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: NCC Urban
description: NCC Urban Infrastructure Ltd. is a Subsidiary of NCC Limited and comes Equipped With a world class building techniques and state-of-the-art building infrastructure that is expertly commandeered by top-notch professionals.  NCC Urban Infrastructure's quality operations span across Residential and commercial complexes, townships, SEZs and serviced apartment complexes. The company has an impressive pan India presence across Bangalore, Hyderabad, Kochi, Vizag, Guntur, Ranchi and Dubai. Strict adherence to superior standards on time deliveries and transparent documentation has made preferred destination for individuals who are looking for quality living at affordable prices.  NCC Urban has inherited its experience and expertise from NCC Limited. Known for its excellence in the execution of Turn key projects, Industrial Buildings, Multistoried, Commercial structures,Townships, Roads, Bridges, Pipelines etc. and rated as growing Infrastructure Company in India with annual turn over nearly Rs. 6,200 crores.

name: Quartermaster
description: Teamwork for your home and neighbourhood.
